body_html:
I tried and successfully installed the latest release via pip install --upgrade tensorflow_gpu . I would suggest the easy way to uninstall everything and try from scratch with pip uninstall tensorflow and try again :)

See installation @ https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow. In your case choose Windows GPU build history 3.5 / 3.6) and find out the build which you want to upgrade.
body_text:
I tried and successfully installed the latest release via pip install --upgrade tensorflow_gpu . I would suggest the easy way to uninstall everything and try from scratch with pip uninstall tensorflow and try again :)
See installation @ https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow. In your case choose Windows GPU build history 3.5 / 3.6) and find out the build which you want to upgrade.
body:
I tried and successfully installed the latest release via `pip install --upgrade tensorflow_gpu` . I would suggest the easy way to uninstall everything and try from scratch with `pip uninstall tensorflow` and try again :)

See installation @ [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow). In your case choose `Windows GPU build history 3.5 / 3.6)` and find out the build which you want to upgrade.
